title: Requires the legislature to provide for the maintenance and support of a system of free public libraries
summary: Provides a constitutional guarantee that the legislature shall provide for the maintenance and support of a system of free public libraries, wherein all the residents of this state may be provided with public library services.

                   CONCURRENT RESOLUTION OF THE SENATE AND ASSEMBLY

       proposing  an  amendment to section 1 of article 11 of the constitution,
         in relation to requiring the legislature to provide for  a  system  of
         free public libraries

    1    Section  1. Resolved (if the Assembly concur), That section 1 of arti-
    2  cle 11 of the constitution be amended to read as follows:
    3    Section 1. The legislature  shall  provide  for  the  maintenance  and
    4  support  of a system of free common schools, wherein all the children of
    5  this state may be educated.  THE LEGISLATURE SHALL PROVIDE FOR THE MAIN-
    6  TENANCE AND SUPPORT OF A SYSTEM OF FREE PUBLIC  LIBRARIES,  WHEREIN  ALL
    7  THE  RESIDENTS  OF  THIS  STATE  MAY  BE  PROVIDED  WITH  PUBLIC LIBRARY
    8  SERVICES.

   12  conformity with  section  1  of  article  19  of  the  constitution,  be
   13  published for 3 months previous to the time of such election.
